wiki-desc: Awarded for reading... well... sports manga. That wasn't particularly hard to figure out, eh?

achievements.title: The stakes are high
achievements.desc: Joined the game for real. The more you read, the more addictive it gets.

achievements.title: Do you even read?
achievements.desc: Even during the most exhausting excercise you still find time to read. Can’t miss a chapter.

achievements.title: Got balls
achievements.desc: Looking at all this struggling inspires you to become strong yourself.

achievements.title: Kuro Basket
achievements.desc: You know the rules of all games already. The podium is yours!
